title: Latin American independence and Creole elites

content.question: Which of the following statements is true of Latin American independence movements in the nineteenth century?

choices.label: Slaves led a majority of the armed revolts.
Creole elites led most revolts against colonial rule.
The United States provided military and financial support to all the revolts.
The revolts led to the elimination of racial discrimination throughout Latin America.

content.answer: Creole elites led most revolts against colonial rule.

topic.text: 5.2: Nationalism and Revolutions in the Period from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
